article_title: Two Years Ago, The Supreme Court Changed Obamacare. Here's What's Happened Since.

article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond

og.description: Two years ago Saturday, the Supreme Court changed the law that changed an industry. The Court's June 28, 2012, decision to uphold the Affordable Care Act—by the slender margin of a single vote—did more than allow the law's ambitious agenda to proceed. It famously altered the law itself, by allowing states [...]
